sentences.sContent: Livestock husbandry in grassland is the preponderant industry in Inner Mongolia.
sentences.sContent_eng: Livestock husbandry in grassland is the preponderant industry in Inner Mongolia.
sentences.sCn: 草原畜牧业是内蒙古的优势产业和基础产业。

sentences.sContent: Indium is one of Chinas preponderant scattered metals; it is often associated with polymetallic zinc ores and enriched into zinc sulfide concentrates after beneficiation.
sentences.sContent_eng: Indium is one of Chinas preponderant scattered metals; it is often associated with polymetallic zinc ores and enriched into zinc sulfide concentrates after beneficiation.
sentences.sCn: 铟是我国的一种优势稀散金属资源，常与多金属锌矿伴生，经过选矿后，铟主要富集于硫化锌精矿中。

synos.tran: 占优势的；突出的；压倒性的

remMethod.val: 来自preponder (ate) (压倒) + ant → 压倒性的 → 占有优势的

words.tran: （在重量、数量、力量等方面）占优势

trans.tranOther: greater in weight, force, influence, etc
